aboutPage.title: About Me
aboutPage.bio: I'm Lucian Ionuț, a full-stack web developer with over 5 years of experience crafting digital experiences. I specialize in building modern, performant web applications using React, Next.js, Laravel, and WordPress. My passion lies in transforming complex ideas into elegant, user-friendly solutions that drive real business results.
aboutPage.circular_text: LETS TALK • LETS TALK • LETS TALK •
aboutPage.hero_description: I collaborate with brands globally to design impactful, mission-focused websites that drive results and achieve business goals.
aboutPage.experience_description: I have worked with some of the most innovative industry leaders to help build their top-notch products.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description: WordPress themes from scratch, React & Next.js apps, Laravel CMS platforms, and OpenCart e-commerce stores. From frontend animations to backend APIs — I cover the full stack.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.description: Started building WordPress sites during university, then sold themes on ThemeForest with 2600+ sales. Grew from junior developer to running my own freelance practice, shipping production code for clients worldwide.

tools.title: Tools & Workflow
tools.description: VS Code, Git, Docker, Figma for design handoffs, and CI/CD pipelines for automated deployments. Every project follows a structured workflow from repo setup to production.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.description: Clean code, performance-first, and pixel-perfect execution. I start by understanding the business goals, plan the architecture, then build iteratively with continuous client feedback until launch.

marketplace.title: Marketplace Experience
marketplace.description: Over 2600 sales on ThemeForest & CodeCanyon with 2 WordPress themes and 6 Laravel CMS products. Built for the international market with a focus on performance, documentation, and user experience.

collaboration.title: Team & Clients
collaboration.description: Worked closely with designers, project managers, and clients from agencies to startups. I adapt to any workflow — whether it's a solo freelance project or collaborating within a full product team.

contact.faq_subtitle: Here are some answers to the most common questions I get from clients.

faq_items.a1: I'm currently working as an independent full-stack web developer and freelancer. I collaborate with clients worldwide on projects ranging from custom WordPress themes to complex React and Laravel applications. I'm open to both freelance projects and full-time opportunities.
faq_items.q2: How much does it cost for a high performing website?
faq_items.a2: Every project is unique, so pricing depends on scope, complexity, and timeline. A simple landing page starts around €1,000, while a full-featured web application can range from €5,000 to €15,000+. I always provide a detailed quote after understanding your requirements.
faq_items.q3: How long will the work take from start to finish?
faq_items.a3: Timelines vary based on the project scope. A typical landing page takes 1–2 weeks, a multi-page website 3–5 weeks, and a complex web application 2–3 months. I'll give you a realistic timeline upfront and keep you updated throughout the process.
faq_items.q4: Are you available to join as full time?
faq_items.a4: Yes, I'm open to full-time remote positions with the right team and project. I'm particularly interested in roles focused on React/Next.js, Laravel, or WordPress development where I can make a meaningful impact. Let's discuss the details!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.contact_note: For any questions regarding this policy, contact us at
privacy.section_0_text: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name and email address when using the contact form. We also collect basic analytics data (page views, browser type) through cookies to improve the website experience.
privacy.section_1_text: Your information is used solely to respond to your inquiries, improve our services, and maintain the website. We never sell or share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes.
privacy.section_2_text: This website uses essential cookies for functionality and optional analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with the site. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through the cookie banner.
privacy.section_3_text: Contact form submissions are retained only as long as necessary to address your inquiry. Analytics data is anonymized and retained for up to 12 months.
privacy.section_4_text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data at any time. You can also withdraw consent for non-essential cookies. To exercise these rights, please contact us via email.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.contact_note: For GDPR-related requests, contact our data controller at
gdpr.section_0_text: Lucian Ionuț acts as the data controller for personal data collected through this website. We process data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (EU) 2016/679.
gdpr.section_1_text: We process personal data based on: (a) your consent when submitting the contact form or accepting cookies, and (b) legitimate interest for essential website functionality and security.
gdpr.section_2_text: Under GDPR, you have the right to: access your personal data, rectify inaccurate data, request erasure ('right to be forgotten'), restrict processing, data portability, and object to processing. We respond to all valid requests within 30 days.
gdpr.section_3_text: Your data is primarily processed within the EU/EEA. If any data is transferred outside the EEA (e.g., through analytics services), appropriate safeguards are in place, including Standard Contractual Clauses.
gdpr.section_4_text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including encrypted connections (HTTPS), secure hosting, and limited data access. In the unlikely event of a data breach, affected individuals and the relevant supervisory authority will be notified within 72 hours.
